text: Clare Wilson ( – 9 October 1917) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside left. ==Career== Wilson spent his early career with Wallsend Park Villa and Gateshead Town. He signed for Bradford City from Gateshead in March 1907.Frost, p. 410 He made 2 league appearances for the club,Frost, p. 390 before joining Glossop in December 1908. He later played for Oldham Athletic and Gateshead. ==Death== Wilson joined the Durham Light Infantry in December 1915 and then transferred to the Manchester Regiment's 22nd Battalion. He was killed in action in 1917 on the Western Front. ==Sources== * ==References== Category:Date of birth missing Category:1886 births Category:1917 deaths Category:People from North Yorkshire Category:English footballers Category:Bradford City A.F.C. players Category:Glossop North End A.F.C. players Category:Oldham Athletic A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football inside forwards Category:British military personnel killed in World War I Category:Manchester Regiment soldiers Category:Durham Light Infantry soldiers
title: Clare Wilson
